abstract.t: The OCSP protocol [RFC2560] enables online validation of the reliability of a digital certificate. RFC2560 defines a mandatory-to-implement mechanism supporting the revocation status of the certificate and defines and optional extension mechanism to support a richer set of semantics (e.g. full path validation by the OCSP server). This document defines Internet-standard extensions to OCSP that enable a client to delegate processing of certificate acceptance functions to a trusted server. The client may control the degree to which delegation takes place. In addition limited support is provided for delegating authorization decisions.
